thread.title: UAH students pushing for 'sanctuary' status worry about minority students, hate crimes
thread.title_full: UAH students pushing for 'sanctuary' status worry about minority students, hate crimes

author: Paul Gattis | pgattis@al.com
title: UAH students pushing for 'sanctuary' status worry about minority students, hate crimes
text: Meanwhile, the Alabama House of Representatives is scheduled Tuesday to debate a bill introduced last week by Rep. Phil Williams, R-Huntsville, that would stifle some of the group's initiatives.
